body.name: Ｍａｉｈａｉｌ Small Desk with Drawers,39" Corner Desk with Storage,Computer Desk with Shelves and Side Pouch, Study Table for Small Space with Storage, Corner L Shaped Desk for Home Office Bedroom,White

features: 【L Shaped Desk For Corner Spaces】This L-shaped desk can easily fit into a corner, maximizing the use of limited space. This L-shaped desk can easily fit into a corner, maximizing the use of limited space. And this computer desk is suitable for various scenes such as offices and study rooms.

【Enrich Storage Space】Compared with traditional small corner desk, this computer desk adds two drawers, a side storage pocket and 2-tier open shelves for storage . The bottom drawer can accommodate A4 file folders. The extra storage space can more effectively organize the work space in the home or office.

【More Detailed Design】 A Versatile Hook can be used for hanging your Headphone, Bag, and other useful gadgets. The back of the desktop is designed with a gap for the charging cable to pass through, so that the computer desk can be completely attached to the wall.

【Solid Structure】This desk adopts a structure combining metal frame and wood, and adds tension bars on the back of the desk. This design satisfies both lightness and stability. Adjustable feet adjust the height of the table legs individually to accommodate uneven floors. Table surface has certain water resistance and wear resistance, so it is very durable.

【𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬】Desktop Dimension: 38.98"x 29.13", Desk Height: 29.13". Package Size:33.1"x 20.3" x 4.5"; net weight:27.23lb; gross weight: 29.87lb. Installation is simple. The package comes with graphic installation instructions and necessary installation tools. If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free tocontact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of shelf storage, great height
reviews.reviewText: This desk isn't perfect but it's decent for the price. There are quite a few brown spots on the metal and I can't tell if it's rust or burn marks. I tried cleaning it with different chemicals but they're here to stay for sure. The instructions are easy to understand and I was able to put it together myself. I like that the pieces were all in recyclable bags inside the box. This keeps the styrofoam splinters off it. This desk is surprisingly sturdy and I love all the shelf space. The drawers under the center are quite short and shallow, they don't go all the way to the back. The drawers have tabs instead of handles to open them, so you have to really focus on where you can grab to open them. This matches another piece of furniture I have in the same room so I'm pleased about that. Overall, this is a decent desk and I'm happy that all my furniture matches now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love, love this L shaped desk, I needed another desk for my laptop and a area to study. It fits perfectly in the space I wanted and was easy to put together. All the parts were there and the tools to complete the task. Price was very good and received it well packaged. Love the shelves and the drawers which are made of cloth, but they pull out just fine. I recommend it for small spaces and it comes in other colors and would buy again. Great Buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This desk was exactly what I was searching for. Fits my space nicely and has just the right amount of storage. Well made and sturdy. Finally a purchase that I an proud of. Easy to assemble and nice price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk is so sleek! It was really easy for my husband to put together - he said the directions were very helpful. My teen daughter tried to assemble first by herself and got super confused and was unable to do it alone. Mind you she's only ever assemble a desk chair so not used to assembling items. The pull out "drawers" are not as deep as you would think and there are no drawer stops so it will take some getting use to for younger users. I was able to easily put all my stuff on it - desktop tower, keyboard, monitor, printer, mouse, and intercom. It feels super sturdy - doesn't wiggle or feel like it's going to fall apart. Honestly for this price and materials you would figure this is junk like a big box store --- WRONG! It's high quality for the price. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND 👍😁👍 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great desk for my 11 year old!
reviews.reviewText: Reliable Wireless Headset for Work and PlayWrite a short review for HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless - Gaming Headset. I like them, use them for teleworking, super reliable.SHere is a draft short review for the HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless gaming headset:The HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless headset has become my go-to for teleworking and gaming. I've been using them for the past few months and have been very impressed with the sound quality, comfort, and wireless reliability.The audio is crisp and clear thanks to the dual chamber drivers. The bass has plenty of punch for intense gaming sessions but doesn't overpower the mids and highs, so music and calls still sound great. The earcups feature plush leatherette and memory foam, allowing me to wear them for hours without fatigue.Connecting wirelessly via the included 2.4GHz USB adapter, I've had no drops or interference even when walking around my apartment. The battery life is excellent, usually lasting me a full workday before needing to recharge. The headset also works wired via the 3.5mm cable for when I need to conserve battery.For those seeking an easy-to-use wireless headset that excels at home office and gaming use, I highly recommend the HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless. The sound and comfort are top-notch while the reliability has impressed me time and again. It's become my daily driver headset for all scenarios.CopyNow one for a Maihail Office Desk, 4 outa 5 starts, perfect for my 11 year old that uses it for gaming and homework, only thing that could be better are the drawers, there's no stop preventing them from falling out.SHere is a draft 4 star review for the Maihail Office Desk:I recently purchased the Maihail Office Desk for my 11 year old to use for both gaming and homework. Overall, it has worked out great and my child has loved using it, so I'm giving it 4 out of 5 stars.The desk provides ample space for gaming setups as well as spreading out textbooks and supplies for schoolwork. Assembly was straightforward with clear instructions. The height is perfect for my child. The surface and edges seem durable enough to withstand regular use.My only complaint is with the drawers - there are no stops or catches to prevent them from sliding all the way out if pulled too far. A couple times my kid has accidentally pulled a drawer completely out and spilled the contents. Some sort of spring-loaded catch to stop the drawers before falling out would have been a useful feature.Aside from the minor issue with the drawers, this desk has proven to be an excellent purchase that suits my child's needs. It provides a good workspace for both play and school at a reasonable price point. If you don't mind the lack of drawer stops, I would recommend the Maihail Office Desk, especially for kids' rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maximize Your Workspace with Style
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a true space-saver, seamlessly fitting into corners and making the most out of confined areas. Beyond its utilitarian design, it caters to diverse settings, effortlessly transitioning between home offices and study rooms.Deviating from conventional desks, it boasts two drawers, a side storage pocket, and 2-tier open shelves. The lower drawer is a practical solution for organizing A4 file folders, offering a streamlined approach to managing work essentials. The additional storage not only declutters my home office but also elevates overall efficiency.The versatile hook is a thoughtful inclusion, ideal for hanging headphones, bags, and various gadgets. The back of the desktop features a discreet gap designed for charging cables, allowing the desk to seamlessly integrate with the wall. These meticulous details not only contribute to functionality but also cultivate an environment of neatness and order.The robust structure is another commendable aspect. Merging a metal frame with wood and incorporating tension bars at the back achieves an optimal blend of lightness and stability. The adjustable feet are a practical touch, adapting effortlessly to uneven floors. The table surface demonstrates durability, showcasing water resistance and wear resistance – a testament to its quality craftsmanship.
